## ``hc_theme_ft``:

Financial Times theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Financial Times theme for highcharts

#### Usage

<pre><code>
hc_theme_ft(...)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ... Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples

```{r}
highcharts_demo() %>%

```
